    Custom Channels | num_employees = 30+ | homepage = [http://www.pulpomedia.com www.pulpomedia.com] }} '''Pulpo Media''' is a privately held online media services company founded by Justin Kuykendall in September 2008. It is headquartered in Berkeley, California, and focuses on Hispanic and Spanish-speaking audiences both inside and outside the US. Pulpo Media began its operations focusing on US Hispanic consumers in 2008, and expanded its services to include Latin American Audiences in 2010 and Spain in 2012. It currently has a major operations center in Buenos Aires, Argentina. In 2011, Pulpo Media was announced as the exclusive online Hispanic Partner for the [[Mitt Romney]] Presidential Campaign, starting in Primaries and extending to the Presidential election,[http://www.hispanictrending.net/2012/05/romney-ad-firm-partners-for-big-data-on-hispanics.html Romney Ad Firm Partners for Big Data on Hispanics] - Hispanic Trending, 2012[http://edition.cnn.com/video/#/video/spanish/2012/05/22/exp-dusa-internet-y-elecciones.cnne La tecnología y las elecciones] - CNN, 2012.
